delivering projects ontime and onbudget Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Senior IT Project Manager Revenue Cycle Childrens Healthcare of Atlanta Atlanta GA December 2014 to Present As a Project Manager PM provide project direction and management of a portfolio of 10 Revenue Cycle Application projects In this role I work with various project internal and external customers to define project scope deploy resources and manage critical deliverables create Work Breakdown WBS project schedule work plan identify and manage risk facilitate executive level project portfolio status meetings reporting on budget and key issues manage vendorcontractor relationships and devise solid communication plans to ensure projects are completed ontime and within budget Managed implementation of Optum Claims Manager denial prevention software imbedded within Epic that automatically check each charge on claim for a wide array of errors omissions and questionable coding relationships by testing the data against an expansive database Managed implementation of ICD10 collaborating with Childrens Physician Group Epic Analyst and Practice Managers to ensure a successful and timely golive Worked with Clinical Application Analyst to transition a Primary Care practice from Hospitalbased HB billing entity to a Professionalbased PB billing entity This included the devolution of JCAHO regulatory requirements and an in depth review of current billing and clinical workflows Managed implementation of NICE call recording software for Patient Financial Services teams to improve productivity of collection calls enhance customer service and increase accuracy of accounts receivables collection Managed implementation of Statement and Web Payment system and IVR Technology to improve outdated patient billing statements and manage relationship with external vendor Change Healthcare to produce print and mail statements to customers Managed implementation of 3M Computer Assisted Coding CAC a tool to increase efficiency and quality of the coding process by automatically generating medical codes directly from clinical documentation Managed the transition of all patient credit card payments and refunds to a PCI compliant processing company Bluefin Worked with Epic Analyst TS and Bluefin resources to ensure Epic Welcome Kiosks and all credit card patient terminals were integrated appropriately with Epic Education Masters in Healthcare Administration University of MarylandCollege Park College Park MD 2008 to 2010 Bachelors in MathematicsIndustrial
